resources.string: If you have a Seedvault backup from aosPB-Project or any other OS, you can restore it here.
Updates aosPB-Project Recovery on first boot subsequent to every update.
Update aosPB-Project Recovery alongside the OS
These services work for you to extend the capabilities of your device. Data will be used in accordance with aosPB-Project's privacy policy.

Help improve aosPB-Project by automatically sending diagnostic and usage data to the developers. This information canâ€™t be used to identify you and lends a hand to teams working on things like battery life, app performance, and new features.
